titles.title: Would You Take My Hand As A Token Of Intention

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Would you take my hand as a token of intention
That I want to be one with you?
I know there are things we have got to go through,
But I want to be one with you.
By the love of God's grace set free in my spirit
I give myself to you.
At this moment in time I want you to know
That I want to be one with you.
At this moment in time I want you to know
That I want to be one with you.
